title: Tian-He - Celestial Lotus  Vegetarian House
description: Also a tiny supermarket with vegetarian products, vegetarian bread & cake, mooncake, cookie, baozi (steamed stuffed bun), dumpling, zongzi (glutinous rice dumpling), birthday cake if booked in advance, "Hinet" brand beer from Korea--pure vegetarian beer without alcohol, Taiwanese soft drinks. Transportation: Bus 2/17/20/22/29/48, take off the bus at Xia-da-xi-cun bus-stop, Xiamen University. Chinese Name: 天荷素食餐厅 Chinese Address: 演武花园顶澳仔10-2（厦大邮局斜对面）.
